content: quickly worked up and a pair in the ladies size can just be squeezed out of a single 50g ball of noro silk garden be sure to work a gauge swatch in the round and pull apart once counted so you can use the wool for the mitts there is a great tutorial on a sneaky way of knitting up a faux-circular swatch on winwick mum s lovely blog http //winwickmum blogspot com au/2015/04/sockalong-gauge-squares html keep your tails short when casting on casting off and adding to the thumb - you will be left with only 2-3 metres of wool and won t want to run out
